<!-- # RealVNC Installation Guide for Mac -->

This guide will walk you through the process of installing and setting up RealVNC on your Macintosh computer to enable remote desktop access.

## Prerequisites

Before you begin, ensure you meet the following requirements:

- A Macintosh computer running a supported version of MacOS (e.g., MacOS 12+).
- Internet access.

## Installation Steps

### 0. Download the installation file **[here](/downloads/VNC-Viewer-7.12.1-MacOSX-universal.dmg)**

### 1. Install RealVNC Viewer:

Locate the downloaded installer file (usually in your Downloads folder) and double-click on it to start the installation process and click on "Allow" when prompted.

![Run Installer](screenshots/realvnc_macOS_2024/step_1.png)

<!-- ![Allow Installation](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-3.png) -->

### 2. Follow Installation Wizard

The installation wizard will guide you through the installation process. Move the VNC Viewer to Applications to finish the installation.
<!-- The installation wizard will guide you through the installation process. Click on "Customize installation" and "Deselect RealVNC Server" and hit "Install". -->

![Move VNC Viewer to Applications](/screenshots/realvnc_macOS_2024/step_2.png)

<!-- ![Customize Installation](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-4.png)

![Deselect RealVNC Server](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-5.png) -->

### 4. Launch RealVNC Viewer

Once the installation is complete, you can launch RealVNC Viewer from Launchpad. 

<!-- ![Open RealVNC using the launch button](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-6.png) -->

![Open RealVNC from Launchpad](screenshots/realvnc_macOS_2024/step_3.png)

If prompted to Log in/Sign Up hit "Cancel", you're **<u>NOT REQUIRED</u>** to sign up.

![Don't Sign up](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-7.png)

<!-- ![Establish a ] -->

## Conclusion

Congratulations! You have successfully installed RealVNC Viewer on your Macintosh machine, allowing you to access and control remote computers with ease.

For more information and support, you can visit the [RealVNC FAQs](https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/viewer/?lai_vid=pXE00z561iP1&lai_sr=0-4&lai_sl=l&lai_p=1).
